main event: An inspector at the Rio de Janeiro International Airport observed a luminous, elongated, white-blue object that maneuvered for about 10 minutes before slowly moving away, making a sharp turn, and disappearing, leaving a luminous trail.
interesting points: The object was observed by multiple people at the airport.
The object maneuvered for a significant amount of time (10 minutes).
The object moved slowly at first, then rapidly disappeared, leaving a luminous trail.
The inspector, who was a civil aviation inspector, reported the incident and requested instructions on the matter.
The report was sent to the Air Technical Intelligence Center at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in the United States.
location: Rio de Janeiro International Airport, Brazil
witnesses: airport inspector and several other people at the airport
